mapper.insert: insert into ln_attach_info (ID, APP_ID, ATTACH_TYPE, ATTACH_NAME, ATTACH_URL, FILE_TYPE, FILE_SIZE, FILE_SERIAL, REMARK, CREATEDBY, CREATEDON, MODIFIEDBY, MODIFIEDON, VERSION, OSS_ID, CAREER_TYPE, LEVEL, CHOOSE_TYPE, PRODUCT_TYPE, SOURCE) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{appId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{attachType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attachName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attachUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fileSerial,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdon,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifiedby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifiedon,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ossId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{careerType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{chooseType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
